headline: ADI Q4 Deep Dive: Industrial and Data Center Momentum Power Strong Outlook
summary: Manufacturer of analog chips Analog Devices (NASDAQ:ADI) reported Q4 CY2025 results exceeding the market’s revenue expectations, with sales up 30.4% year on year to $3.16 billion. On top of that, next quarter’s revenue guidance ($3.5 billion at the midpoint) was surprisingly good and 8.1% above what analysts were expecting. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.46 per share was 6.6% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

raw.headline: ADI Q4 Deep Dive: Industrial and Data Center Momentum Power Strong Outlook
raw.summary: Manufacturer of analog chips Analog Devices (NASDAQ:ADI) reported Q4 CY2025 results exceeding the market’s revenue expectations, with sales up 30.4% year on year to $3.16 billion. On top of that, next quarter’s revenue guidance ($3.5 billion at the midpoint) was surprisingly good and 8.1% above what analysts were expecting. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.46 per share was 6.6% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
